name: Ruler of the Dice
description:
--->Welcome to our first GMTK Game Jam entry! <---

(and also our very first attempt to programm a game...)

Play as D6, the king of all dices and smither down the evil Dombies with your sword!

(Main feature still in development)

These are the mockups which came more and more (or less) to life:

Made by RoodyOh & InvitusCode
